page.title: 05RIFT HOUSE WARD
page.content: { Rift House Ward The houses were built in the{1950's and have medium sized front and back gardens.Some houses have garages.Some houses are terraced and there are a lot of council houses in this area. All the houses have a wash house or coal house and the windows are flush. The average sized house has three bedrooms but only a few have a garage.A few rows of houses are semi- detatached. In Oxford Rd the houses are{90yrs old.They have recently gone through a stage of modernisation in about {1976}.About{20}years ago there used to be water pumps in the back yards,but they have been since removed.Central heating etc.has been installed by the council.There are a few streets of late{19th}.century houses,these are privately owned with modern amenities.
